name: Strix Vengeance
summary: You dedicate yourself to destroying those who harm your kin.
description:
You dedicate yourself to destroying those who harm your kin. Until the end of your next turn, you deal an additional +1d6 damage on Strikes against the triggering enemy. The bonus increases to +2d6 if you use a striking weapon or unarmed attack and +3d6 if you use a major striking weapon or unarmed attack.Traits

Emotion: This effect alters a creature's emotions. Effects with this trait always have the mental trait as well. Creatures with special training or that have mechanical or artificial intelligence are immune to emotion effects.

Mental: A mental effect can alter the target's mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.Strix: Winged humanoids, most of whom live in and around Cheliax.
trigger: You, or a strix ally you can see, are damaged by an enemy's critical hit.
